snippet: “Shotgun Lovesongs,” Nickolas Butler’s debut novel, is set in Wisconsin and revolves around old friends brought together for a wedding.
abstract: Janet Maslin reviews book Shotgun Lovesongs by Nickolas Butler.
lead_paragraph: “Shotgun Lovesongs,” Nickolas Butler’s debut novel, is set in Wisconsin and revolves around old friends brought together for a wedding.

headline.main: Friends Return, but Can’t Go Back
headline.print_headline: Friends Return, but Can’t Go Back
